updates.title: Figma's acquisition of AI media generation company Weavy signals major push into AI-powered creative workflows, with plans to integrate into the broader Figma platform in coming months.

ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio models will become 'commoditized' over time, suggesting a shift toward differentiation through user experience and specialized features rather than core model capabilities.
Pinterest launches AI-powered shopping assistant to help users select outfits and make style decisions, expanding AI's role in e-commerce and creative decision-making.
AI browser security concerns escalate as new chatty browsers from OpenAI and Microsoft raise cybersecurity risks, with experts warning of potential vulnerabilities in AI-powered browsing experiences.
Enterprise SaaS landscape shifts toward AI agents riding on top of core business workflows, with Box CEO predicting fundamental changes in how enterprise software will be structured and used.
